title: Bubba Watson
summary: Gerry Lester "Bubba" Watson Jr.[3][4] (born November 5, 1978) is an American professional golfer who plays on the PGA Tour. One of the few left-handed golfers on tour, he is a multiple major champion, with victories at the Masters Tournament in 2012 and 2014.[5] In February 2015, Watson reached a career-high 2nd place in the Official World Golf Ranking.
